title.narrative: Climate change mitigation and poverty reduction through the development of the cashew sector in Burkina Faso (Wouol project)

description.narrative: In Burkina Faso, the Wouol Farmers’ Association is a national-level union of cooperatives, a type of organization recognized as a private sector entity in Burkinabe legislation1. Wouol aims to improve the livelihoods of the rural population through sustainable management and valuing of natural and cultural resources.

activity-date.narrative: Planned start date of the activity

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA
